LanguageData.Gash.label: gash
LanguageData.Gash.description: a ragged cut that bleeds profusely.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceRedHazeAddiction.label: Red Haze need
LanguageData.ReviaRaceRedHazeAddiction.description: An almost rabid bloodthirst grips this person. A constant supply of powdered bloodstone appears to be the only way to keep it under control. Without a supply of it, this person will frequently enter a state of berserk rage, slaking his or her bloodthirst on anyone nearby.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceRedHazeFury.label: Red Haze
LanguageData.ReviaRaceRedHazeFury.description: A strange, almost rabid bloodthirst grips this person.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceSoulreapTier1.label: Soul Reap (1)
LanguageData.ReviaRaceSoulreapTier1.description: An indication of how many lives this Revia has taken. Revia grow stronger with the more lives they take.
